description: Croatia is a country in the. It is also where The hit HBO series 'Game of Thrones' was filmed, they recorded it on the the Dalmatian coast in Split and Dubrovnik.
image: data:image/jpeg;base64,
---

# Croatia is undoubtedly one of the most beautiful countries in the world. You are spoiled for choice with beautiful inland cities like Zagreb or coastal towns like Split, Zadar and Dubrovnik.

<br>

# Temperatures in Croatia are pretty average but get as highest an average of 22-30 degrees celcius during july and august. If you like a bit cooler weather you could travel between the months of May-june or September-November where temperatures are a bit lower.

<br>

# If you want to travel there you can expect a 7-day trip to cost you around:

<br>

* $1,602 as a solo traveler
* $2,737 for a couple (2 people)
* $1,564 for a family of 4 people

<br>

# Croatia hotels range from $44 to $199 per night with an average of $78, while most vacation rentals will cost $160 to $390 per night for the entire home.
